title: My Little Pony 'n Friends
overview: The story of a human named Megan in a world of magical ponies and their adventures together in Pony Land.My Little Pony is an American animated television series produced by Sunbow Productions and Marvel Productions based on the My Little Pony toys released by Hasbro. The series featured as the first segment of a program called My Little Pony 'n Friends. The second segment would be an unrelated cartoon based on another Hasbro franchise. It first aired 09/01/1986. It ran for two seasons for a total of 61 episodes.
